name: Square Challenger
description:
My very first Indie Game.  A Simple & Casual Square on it's way to the finish line. Small and easy to finish. 

Main Highlights of the Game:-

  • Contains 8 Levels
  • Calm & Soothing Music
  • Easy to Play

Made by Stealth Inc.
